price: 5. Boye tóbetela bino bokundoli ete bozalaki bato mabe?
arabic: أَفَنَضۡرِبُ عَنكُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَ صَفۡحًا أَن كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا مُّسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: afanaḍribu ʿankumu al-dhik'ra ṣafḥan an kuntum qawman mus'rifīna
